hero.description: Transform your business with certified eco-friendly packaging solutions that reduce your environmental impact while delivering exceptional business value.

about.title: Leading the Sustainable Packaging Revolution
about.p1: Achieve Pack® is the parent company of pouch.eco, founded in 2011 in Hong Kong. We specialize in providing one-stop solutions for businesses seeking to transition to eco-friendly packaging without compromising on quality or cost-effectiveness.
about.p2: Our mission is to make sustainable packaging accessible to businesses of all sizes, offering certified compostable materials, recyclable options, and bio-based solutions that significantly reduce environmental impact while delivering superior business value.

benefits.title: Environmental & Business Benefits
benefits.description: Our sustainable packaging solutions deliver exceptional value on both environmental and business fronts.

carbon.title: 70% Carbon Footprint Reduction
carbon.desc: Significantly lower environmental impact compared to traditional plastic packaging.

compostable.title: Certified Compostable Materials
compostable.desc: Break down naturally in composting environments without harmful residues.

plantBased.title: Plant-Based Renewable Materials
plantBased.desc: Made from renewable resources like cornstarch and sugarcane, reducing fossil fuel dependence.

recyclable.title: GRS-Certified Recyclable Options
recyclable.desc: Global Recyclable Standard certified materials for complete circular economy integration.

moq.title: Low Minimum Order: 100 Pieces
moq.desc: Start small with our low MOQ, compared to 5K-10K minimums elsewhere.

turnaround.title: Fast Turnaround Times
turnaround.desc: Samples in 2-3 weeks, full production in 6-8 weeks to meet your timeline.

shipping.title: 15-22% Shipping Cost Savings
shipping.desc: Lighter packaging reduces shipping costs while maintaining product protection.

finish.title: Premium Finishes at Lower Cost
finish.desc: Professional printing and finishing options that don't break the budget.

products.title: Sustainable Packaging Solutions
products.description: Choose from our comprehensive range of eco-friendly packaging materials designed for various applications.

compostable.title: Compostable & Biodegradable
compostable.desc: Home and industrial compostable options that break down safely in composting environments.

recyclable.title: Mono-Recyclable
recyclable.desc: GRS-certified 100% recyclable materials designed for efficient recycling streams.

pcr.title: Post-Consumer Recycled
pcr.desc: PCR plastic with lower carbon footprint, giving new life to recycled materials.

bio.title: Bio-based PE
bio.desc: Sustainable sugarcane-based packaging that reduces fossil fuel dependence.

solutions.title: Industry Solutions
solutions.description: Specialized packaging solutions tailored to meet the unique requirements of different industries.

food.title: Food & Beverage
food.desc: Chocolate, nuts, tea, coffee, and other food products with various barrier requirements.

cosmetics.title: Cosmetics & Personal Care
cosmetics.desc: Premium packaging for beauty and personal care products with elegant finishes.

health.title: Health & Wellness
health.desc: Medical and wellness products requiring high barrier protection and compliance.

pet.title: Pet Products
pet.desc: Pet food and treats packaging with odor barriers and resealable options.

features.title: Advanced Packaging Features
features.description: Comprehensive customization options to meet your specific product requirements and brand needs.

comparison.title: Flexible vs. Rigid Packaging
comparison.description: Discover why flexible packaging is the superior choice for both environmental and business considerations.

process.title: Our Simple 5-Step Process
process.description: From initial consultation to final delivery, we make sustainable packaging accessible and straightforward.

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.description: See how businesses like yours have transformed their packaging with Achieve Pack solutions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our sustainable packaging solutions.

certs.q: What certifications do your packaging materials have?
certs.a: Our compostable materials are certified to EN13432 and ASTM D6400 standards, while our recyclable options carry GRS (Global Recycled Standard) certification. All materials meet international safety and environmental standards.

moq.q: What is the minimum order quantity?
moq.a: We offer one of the lowest MOQs in the industry at just 100 pieces, making sustainable packaging accessible to startups and small businesses. This is significantly lower than the 5,000-10,000 piece minimums typically required elsewhere.

time.a: Sample production takes 2-3 weeks, and full production takes 6-8 weeks from approval. This timeline allows us to ensure quality while meeting your launch requirements.

cost.q: Are your packaging materials cost-effective compared to traditional plastic?
cost.a: Yes! While the material cost may be slightly higher, you typically save 15-22% on shipping costs due to reduced weight, and 70% on warehouse space. Many clients find the total cost of ownership is competitive or better than traditional options.

barrier.q: What barrier options are available for different products?
barrier.a: We offer 8 different barrier levels ranging from low barrier for dry goods to maximum barrier for products requiring extended shelf life. Our team will recommend the optimal barrier based on your specific product requirements.

design.q: Can you help with custom design and printing?
design.a: Absolutely! We offer comprehensive design services including up to 10-color plate printing and unlimited digital printing. We also provide various finishes like matte, gloss, soft-touch, metallic, spot UV, and embossing options.

contact.title: Get Started Today
